name: Happy Birthday Chumi (2021)
description:
A young troll stands in their session. It just so happens that today, the 15th of April is this troll's birthday. Though it was twenty four years ago they were given life, it is only today they star in this game !

Happy Birthday Chumi/Choombie/choob/Chomgus/Chompgus !! This is like the 5th time I recreated this project in GMS2. The idea of making a homestuck prototype for your birthday has been in my head for years, and I wanted to get back into gamedev recently so I thought it would be a good opportunity :^U!

Anyway, I hope you're having a fun birthday eating lots of meats !!

---

CONTROLS:

WASD to move

Mouse to face left or right

Left click to WACK enemies !!!

Spacebar to jump

When you get stuck inside of a wall,, keep jumping to get yourself outta theya !

There's nothing to do other than wack enemies around with your stick, sometimes i like to jump on the trees or stand on top of enemies :^U

Creative process and source of assets have been documented in this channel: 

https://www.are.na/knavehaven/c97-415-birthday-engine

Player sprite originally by Chumi pulled from her tumblr.

The song that blays in the BG is "Blue Atom" by David Ellis off of coloUrs and mayhem: Universe B.

Programming and production by knaveHaven
